      • isOkClicked

        public boolean isOkClicked()
        Keeps tracking if the ok button is clicked.
        Returns:
        okClicked includes the value if the button is clicked or not.

      • fontValue

        public int fontValue(int value)
        FontValue includes the information of what text item on the calendar has been clicked and which text's font styles are supposed to change.
        Parameters:
        value - is the value of the different text items on the calendar view for example header texts or weekday names.
        Returns:
        fontValue is the value of the text items.
